CHAT.comment: WARNER-LAMBERT CO., LLC, ET AL., Petitioners v. KIMBERLY KENT, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:05 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF CARTER G. PHILLIPS ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DARYL JOSEFFER, ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ALLISON M. ZIEVE ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
(Whereupon, at 12:05 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
